## Producto Notable

La formula del producto notable es:

$$(a+b)^2=a^2+2ab+b^2$$

# Función con R

```{r}
binomioNewton2 = function(a, b){
  a^2+2*a*b+b^2
}
binomioNewton2(1,2)
```
# Binomio de Newton

$$(a+b)^n=\sum_{k=0}^n {n\choose k}\cdot a^{n-k}\cdot b^k$$

# Función en R

```{r}
binomioNewton = function(a, b, n){
  cumsum(choose(n,(0:n))*a^{n-(0:n)}*b^(0:n))[n+1]
}
binomioNewton(2,1,2)
```
